I'm currently a senior product designer at Grubhub helping restaurants across the country grow their businesses.

Grubhub

2017â€“Present

A couple of questions I ask myself throughout the design process at Grubhub:

  • How does this impact our ecosystem of diners, drivers, and internal teams?
  • Does this scale across our wide range of restaurants - from small businesses to national chains?
  • Where does this fit in a restaurant's day to day operations? What other tablets, point-of-sale systems, fax machines, and printers are behind the counter with us?
